entries.meaning: (Canada, chiefly Toronto, MTE, slang) A member of a youth subculture group that listens to urban music, wears puffer jackets and sportswear, uses a heavy Toronto accent (with lingo), is typically uneducated, and may be engaged in illegal activities.
(obsolete, games) The blindfolded player in the game of hoodman-blind, or blind man's buff.
